works great from my external hdd with kmeaw 3.55 cfw and rogero backup manager. Thanks for the upload.

It's amazing how many people want free games, but don't have the common sense to read the instructions on how to do just about anything except download them.

When you put all the files in the Gamez folder, you open Gaia Manager or MultiMan. Then you choose to load the game, and it goes back to the XMB. You should have already had another game disc in your drive, otherwise it doesn't work. When you go to your disc icon under Game, it will actually be the game you chose to load, instead of the game that's in the drive, since the way it loads the games is by mounting them.
By the way, THIS DOES NOT WORK. Download from somewhere else.
